contest-event.event-date:
May 24, 1924 D Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A)
Holme Valley Brass Band Contest (Section A) 10 Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest Holme Valley Brass Band Contest holme-valley-brass-band-contest-a
Civic Hall, Holmfirth Prizes - 1st £15 and cup, 2nd £12, 3rd £8, 4th £5. 4th annual contest. 8 bands competed.
April 4, 2012, 9:14 p.m. Oct. 26, 2018, 9:39 a.m.
1 Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Joseph Crawford Dyson
2 Sowerby Bridge Subscription William Halliwell
3 Haworth Band W. Wood
4 Hinchliffe Mill Band Noel Thorpe
Unknown Result Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Unknown
Unknown Result Holme Silver (Disposables UK Group) Band Unknown
Unknown Result Lindley Band Unknown
Unknown Result Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Unknown
